sentences.en: X-ray examination of a recently discovered painting—judged by some authorities to be a self-portrait by Vincent van Gogh—revealed an under image of a woman's face.
sentences.cn: 对最近发现的一幅画作被一些权威人士判定为文森特·凡高的自画像，对其进行的 X 光检查揭示了一个女人脸部的底层图像。

sentences.en: Because the face of the woman in the under image also appears on canvases Van Gogh is known to have painted, the surface painting must be an authentic self-portrait by Van Gogh.
sentences.cn: 因为下面的女人的脸也出现在梵高画过的画布上，所以这幅凸版印刷一定是梵高的自画像。

sentences.en: There's a self-portrait and one of me bare-chested.
sentences.cn: 其中有一幅他的自画像和一幅画我的裸上身人像。
